# <img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/16841846/288081203-0072fc18-5444-4d51-a22d-48317d1c6b2c.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..HBZZ770GhhSCWBPMuECUax8PDJD9aKEVIuISLGkYfjI" width="30"/> MetaPAL: Free, Open-Source Software for Integrating Proteomics and Machine Learning [![Follow us on Twitter](https://img.shields.io/twitter/follow/smith_chem_wisc?label=Twitter&style=social)](https://twitter.com/smith_chem_wisc)
A framework for reading and writing ML-ready proteomics data

## Unique Spectrum Identifiers - USI
A USI can be used to uniquely identify any mass spectrum from any file hosted on the ProteomeXChange. 

USIs take the following format: mzspec:(Dataset Identifier):(File Name):(Index Type):(Index Number):(Optional Interpretation)

Example: mzspec:PXD000561:Adult_CD4Tcells_bRP_Elite_28_f15:scan:12517:SYEAALLPLYMEGGFVEVIHDK/3
